summary:
Sprinting while wearing armor builds experience for Light and Heavy Armor.

Increasing Heavy Armor allows players to sprint for longer.

Increasing Light Armor results in being able to move faster overall.
descriptionHtml:
[b]=Summary=[/b]

Sprinting while wearing armor builds experience for Light and Heavy Armor.

Increasing Heavy Armor allows players to sprint for longer.

Increasing Light Armor results in being able to move faster overall.

Just about everything is customizable too!

[b]=Installation=[/b]

Please extract ArmoredSprint.bsa and ArmoredSprint.esp to Skyrim\'s Data folder and ensure the mod is set to load before playing.

[b]=Removal=[/b]

Armored Sprint makes permanent changes to the player character\'s actor values.

Please be sure to disable these changes using the Armored Sprint lesser power or the Mod Configuration Menu before removing the mod.

[b]=Mirrors=[/b]

Steam Workshop: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=158947822]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=158947822[/url]

[b]=Compatibility=[/b]

This mod was tested on Skyrim v1.9.32.0.8 and cleaned with TES5Edit v3.0.30.

It does not make any changes to the base game and is entirely script-driven.

It also fully supports SkyUI\'s Mod Configuration Menu but does not require it or SKSE.

[b]=Known Issues=[/b]

-Player-enchanted armor must be re-equipped after first loading the mod.
--There is a known issue with Skyrim that prevents custom enchantments from being applied when items are equipped through script.

[b]=Change List=[/b]

--v1.1--

-Implemented MCM support

-Expanded customization options

-Fixed an issue where Armored Sprint abilities would disappear from saved games

[b]=Disclaimer=[/b]

-Support for this modification will be provided at my discretion.

-Please feel free to distribute this modification provided it remains unaltered.

-Please contact me if you wish to alter or localize this modification.
--I go by KainXavier on the Nexus network and Kain-Xavier on Steam.
author: Kain-Xavier
